SENT.plain: The reported case was observed in a 62-year-old female in whom a syndrome of vascular disturbances developed suddenly in the area vascularized by the artery of Adamkiewicz
In the analysis of the pathological mechanism of these changes compression injury, myelitis, pelvic phlebothrombosis were excluded
Thrombosis of the artery of Adamkiewicz due to atheromatosis of the spinal arteries, was diagnosed
The atheromatous process involves the anterior spinal artery in 4% of subjects aged from 60 to 70 years
